COMMITTEE ON FINANCE
March 27, 1967
Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
Dear Mrs. Newman:
Further reference is made to my letter to you
with respect to your interest in the inclusion of
educational radio in any legislation involving
educational broadcasting.
As you probably know. Senator Magnuson
recently introduced S. 1160, a bill calling for
the creation of a Public Television Corporation and
extending the Educational Television Facilities Act.
This legislation includes radio as well as
television, and a copy is enclosed for your
information.
In addition, I am enclosing a copy of the
statement made at the time the legislation was
introduced, and a copy of a notice indicating that
hearings are to start on April 11th on this
legislation.
You can rest assured that I will follow it
very closely, and your views will have my full
attention when it reaches the Floor of the Senate.
With kind regards.
Sincerely yours.
Geora^A. Smathers, USS
